Package com.lambdaschool.oktafoundation.controllers

Class CountryDataController

java.lang.Object
com.lambdaschool.oktafoundation.controllers.CountryDataController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/otherapis")
public class CountryDataController
extends java.lang.Object
The entry point to work with the Country Data API
https://restcountries.eu

  • Method Details

    • populateInfoForCountryCode

      @GetMapping("/populatecountrydata/{countrycode}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> populateInfoForCountryCode​(@PathVariable java.lang.String countrycode)
      Populates a public field from the main class. That field contains data from the last queried country
      Example: http://localhost:2019/otherapis/populatecountrydata/usa
      Parameters:
      countrycode - The country code (String) of the country you seek. For example usa, mex, ca, fin
      Returns:
      Status of created

    • listInfoForCountryData

      @GetMapping("/currentcountrydata") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> listInfoForCountryData()
      Returns the data for the last country's data that got loaded.
      Example: http://localhost:2019/otherapis/currentcountrydata
      Returns:
      The current country data

    • getTestingParameter

      @GetMapping("/testing") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getTestingParameter​(@RequestParam java.lang.String testing)
      Endpoint used to test parameters
      Example: http://localhost:2019/otherapis/testing?testing=john
      Parameters:
      testing - a just string that gets reported back to the user
      Returns:
      The string from testing and status OK
